import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import '../styles.scss'; export default function MemberInfo(data) { const [tab,setTab] = useState(0); const partnerOn = Date.parse(data.partnerWhen) const turnedPartner = new Date(partnerOn) return (
    { data.isPartner ? <>
  • setTab(1)} className={`profile-about__tabs--el ${tab === 1 ? 'about-active' : ''}`}>

    Visão geral

  • setTab(2)} className={`profile-about__tabs--el ${tab === 2 ? 'about-active' : ''}`}>

    Atuação

  • setTab(3)} className={`profile-about__tabs--el ${tab === 3 ? 'about-active' : ''}`}>

    Estatísticas

    • : <>

  • Professor?

{ tab === 1 &&
  • location_on

  • home

  • phone

} { tab === 2 &&
  • location_on

    {data.location}

  • bookmark

    {data.work_address}

  • group

    Membro desde:

    {' ' + turnedPartner.getDate() }/{1 + turnedPartner.getMonth() }/{turnedPartner.getFullYear()}

} { tab === 3 &&
  • bar_chart

    {data.projects.length} Projeto(s)

  • compare_arrows

} { !data.isPartner ?

  • Torne-se membro para usufruir de todos os recursos do website.

); }
